attributes.action: Prevent Theresa May from being appointed to the House of Lords
attributes.background: Theresa May should never be considered for appointment to the House of Lords.  She has failed to deliver BREXIT as was expected by the U.K. electorate.  She should never be allowed to enter the House of Lords where she can make further poor decisions on important British Acts, Laws etc...

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments.
